item.title: U.S. reaffirms commitment to Taiwan as Beijing conducts live fire drills in East China Sea
item.description: Chinese military extended into second day a joint exercise involving its army, navy and rocket forces near the coast of Taiwan.

item.title: Trump's upcoming tariffs 'will be effective immediately,' White House says
item.description: Trump's reciprocal tariffs follow other import duties he has already announced, including tariffs on goods from Canada and Mexico and industry-specifi...

item.title: DOJ to seek death penalty for Luigi Mangione in CEO Brian Thompson murder case
item.description: Luigi Mangione is accused of stalking UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson and killing him outside a New York hotel in December.

item.title: Layoffs begin at U.S. health agencies charged with tracking disease, researching, and regulating food
item.description: Employees across the massive U.S. Department of Health and Human Services began receiving notices of dismissal on Tuesday.

item.title: The 'Dirty 15' percent: Some countries will take a harder hit from Trump's tariffs
item.description: Trump has pointed to America's trade deficits as he argues that virtually all trading partners are "taking advantage" of the U.S.
